name: Solitaire P2E
description:
Harvest it!
Build your farm and enjoy the bonuses along the way to make your Harvest.
Start your solitaire adventure by solving the tripeaks solitaire puzzles at each level.
Any tabletop game which one can play by oneself, usually with cards, but also with dominoes.
Get bonus credits and bonus cards for longer solitaire streaks.If you love solitaire, you'll adore it!
